name: Apex Capital
description: Premium private equity website template with immersive dark theme, featuring glassmorphic design elements, floating particle animations, and grain texture overlays. Includes portfolio showcases, team profiles, service descriptions, insights/blog section, and validated contact forms. Perfect for private equity firms, investment companies, and venture capital organizations seeking a sophisticated digital presence.
features: Fully responsive mobile-first design with uniform mobile layouts
SEO optimized with comprehensive metadata, Open Graph, and Twitter cards
Immersive dark theme with black background and red/purple/amber accent colors
Floating particle background animations with multiple color variations
Glassmorphic navigation with backdrop blur effects and sticky positioning
Grain texture overlay for premium cinematic aesthetic
Scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer API
Parallax scrolling effects and hero section blur transitions
Portfolio company showcase with Unsplash images and alternating desktop layouts
Interactive portfolio filtering by sector (Technology, Healthcare, Financial Services) and status
Team member profiles with circular professional headshots and bio cards
Service cards with gradient backgrounds and visual hierarchy
Insights/blog section with category filtering and article cards
Ultra-light typography with Montserrat headings and Inter body text
Smooth hover effects and cubic-bezier transitions throughout
